text: Is it possible to add the blog title to the `title` tag in the `head`?
Also running into a slight bug when an error shows. I have an arrow as a `::after` <https://gyazo.com/e775c704feceb0b9b934f8c11eaac900>
But when I click, the error shows up as it should but the arrow moves <https://gyazo.com/da0cdb216345038668c0abbfbd2326ef>

<@UF718CZ0A> The arrow is probably attached to the cointainer of the input not the input itself. try making the error message position absolute and position it where you want so it doesnt distort the container when it errors
